solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public List<String> summaryRanges(int[] nums) {--newline--        int length = nums.length;--newline--        List<String> result = new ArrayList<String>(length);--newline--        for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {--newline--            int num = nums[i];--newline--            while (i < length - 1 && nums[i] + 1 == nums[i + 1]) {--newline--                i++;--newline--            }--newline--            if (num != nums[i]) {--newline--                result.add(num + "->" + nums[i]);--newline--            } else {--newline--                result.add(num + "");--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        return result;--newline--    }--newline--}
